title: Leaves of absence to accept appointed positions exempt from the civil service; prohibited
context: [ยง76-30.5] Leaves of absence to accept appointed positions exempt from the civil service; prohibited. Notwithstanding section 78-23, no leave of absence shall be granted to any employee who leaves a position covered under this chapter for a position that is exempt from this chapter under section 76-16(b)(7), (8), (9), (10), or (16) and whose term of appointment is not less than one year; provided that this section shall not apply to any employee whose collective bargaining agreement provides for the granting of a longer leave of absence. [L 2010, c 70, ยง1]
